title: S1, looking for ranked duo buddy, must have skype/discord, I'm Mid/Top usually
body:
Hey there fellow summoners! 

I'm currently Silver 1 looking for a buddy (buddies) to duo with, I'm finding solo queue to be quite painful. I like to use Discord/Skype so that way I can talk to and co-ordinate with at least one person on my team and plan ganks or discuss strategies and debrief post game. 

I'm currently Mid Morgana or Top laning so ideally I would like to find a jungler main. 

I'm sitting at about 60% win rate but I know I can improve, I'm not the best player but I generally know my stuff and try not to feed and rage, I dont afk or troll and I rarely surrender (unless its like really super hopeless) 

Looking for likeminded players to climb into gold :)

replies.body:
Hey man don't know if the offer is still up but I like where your head is at and hopefully if you haven't spiraled to Plat or above already you could duo with me.
Currently in B1 but I know I can do better and I am a jg/adc main
